## Source: ossf-package-analysis (558a211dc43b6520b3337975ab954f89ca97679707396cd9dcf19a8a0853b647)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'test-on-other-again' @ 99.9.8 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
